experience.title: Data Analyst
experience.description: • Conducted statistical analysis on Drinking water, health and sanitation data of 65th, 69th and 76th round provided from NSSOusing R•Postprocessed the data reports to extract inter-state tables of the parameters of 35 states and union territories of India using Python• Implemented Excel and SQL for raw data collection and formatted data from reports according to standard convention for data processing• Managed over 2 lakhs household data, provided statistical report with more than 95% accuracy which is uploaded in India Data Portal

experience.title: Captain
